thread.title_full: POTD: Emmerdale reconstruction as Robert shooting mystery continues - Emmerdale News - Soaps - Digital Spy

author: Daniel Kilkelly
title: POTD: Emmerdale reconstruction as Robert shooting mystery continues - Emmerdale Soaps
text: It's another tense time in Emmerdale tonight (October 14) as the police stage a reconstruction of the night that Robert Sugden was shot.Prime suspect Lawrence White (John Bowe) and witness Chas Dingle both take part in front of several onlookers, but it soon becomes clear that they have very different recollections of what happened.Lawrence continues to lie to the police by taking the blame for the shooting, but he struggles when asked to provide precise details about his actions.Chas, meanwhile, is determined to protect her son Aaron Livesy at any cost and so ends up providing a story that completely contradicts what Lawrence said. As the Robert case becomes ever more complicated, is the shooter any closer to being revealed?
